events.message: Hello, I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's case has been classified under the refund category due to their request for money back.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello, I'm John from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and solution, I appreciate the prompt handling of my refund request.
The refund has been initiated. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory.
Since the refund was successfully processed and confirmed, we are closing this case now.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey. Please take a moment to share your experience with our support.
